name: Forewarn
description: When this Pokemon feels bad intentions or disaster approaching, it will mentally warn its allies.
effect: The first time this pokemon is hit by for Super Effective Damage (or greater) during a scene, resolve damage (including minimum damage) as if the attack was Ineffective. As a bonus action on the User's turn, they may designate an opponent and reveal the move that has the greatest number of Damage Dice (if applicable, as chosen by the GM).
